name: @svelte-put/movable
description: Makes nodes movable with mousedown and mousemove.
readme:
# `@svelte-put/movable` [![npm.badge]][npm] [![bundlephobia.badge]][bundlephobia] [![docs.badge]][docs] [![repl.badge]][repl] Svelte action `use:movable` - make a node move on mousedown & mousemove ![demo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vnphanquang/svelte-put/next/packages/movable/static/images/demo.gif)
